message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in its utility to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $95, which I believe strikes a fair balance between my investment and your perceived value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, let's proceed with the transaction.
